statements: SELECT * FROM employee_profiles WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT full_name, skills FROM employee_profiles WHERE employee_id = 2;
SELECT full_name, achievements FROM employee_profiles WHERE employee_id IN (3, 4);
SELECT * FROM employee_profiles WHERE full_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT employee_id, full_name FROM employee_profiles ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_profiles WHERE employee_id = 12345;
SELECT full_name, skills FROM employee_profiles WHERE skills @> ARRAY['Python', 'SQL'];
SELECT * FROM employee_profiles WHERE achievements IS NOT NULL;
SELECT full_name, career_history FROM employee_profiles ORDER BY full_name ASC, employee_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT full_name FROM employee_profiles WHERE full_name ILIKE '%john%';
SELECT * FROM EmployeeProfile;
SELECT full_name, position FROM EmployeeProfile WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT years_of_experience, skill_name FROM EmployeeSkills ORDER BY years_of_experience DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT department FROM EmployeeProfile;
SELECT full_name, position, hire_date FROM EmployeeProfile WHERE hire_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM EmployeeProfile WHERE department = 'HR' ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT full_name, position, hire_date FROM EmployeeProfile WHERE position = 'Manager' AND hire_date < '2022-01-01';

SELECT e.full_name, e.position, s.skill_name, s.proficiency_level FROM EmployeeProfile e INNER JOIN EmployeeSkills s ON e.employee_id = s.employee_id WHERE s.proficiency_level >= 3 ORDER BY e.full_name ASC, s.skill_name DESC;
SELECT full_name, position, hire_date, performance_review_date FROM EmployeeProfile WHERE department = 'IT' AND (hire_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31') ORDER BY hire_date DESC;

SELECT department, AVG(years_of_experience) AS avg_experience FROM EmployeeProfile JOIN EmployeeSkills ON EmployeeProfile.employee_id = EmployeeSkills.employee_id GROUP BY department HAVING AVG(years_of_experience) > 5 ORDER BY avg_experience DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_profiles;
SELECT name, position FROM employee_profiles WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, skill_name, skill_level FROM employee_skills WHERE skill_level > 3;
SELECT * FROM employee_achievements ORDER BY achievement_date DESC;
SELECT position, COUNT(*) as total FROM employee_profiles GROUP BY position;
SELECT * FROM employee_profiles WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT name, position FROM employee_profiles WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, skill_name, skill_level FROM employee_skills WHERE skill_level > 3 ORDER BY skill_level DESC;
SELECT achievement_date, achievement_desc FROM employee_achievements WHERE achievement_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM employee_profiles JOIN employee_skills ON employee_profiles.id = employee_skills.id WHERE employee_skills.skill_name = 'JavaScript';
SELECT * FROM employee_profiles;
SELECT full_name, department FROM employee_profiles ORDER BY department ASC;
SELECT * FROM skills WHERE proficiency_level > 3;
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth FROM employee_profiles WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT e.full_name, c.job_title, a.achievement_description FROM employee_profiles e, career_history c, achievements a WHERE e.id = c.employee_id AND e.id = a.employee_id AND c.job_title = 'Manager';
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth, department FROM employee_profiles WHERE department = 'IT' ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT full_name, department, date_of_birth FROM employee_profiles WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '1995-12-31' ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT job_title, start_date, end_date FROM career_history WHERE end_date IS NULL;

SELECT full_name, skill_name, proficiency_level FROM employee_profiles JOIN skills ON employee_profiles.id = skills.employee_id WHERE proficiency_level > 3 ORDER BY full_name ASC, proficiency_level DESC;
SELECT full_name, achievement_description, date_achieved FROM employee_profiles JOIN achievements ON employee_profiles.id = achievements.employee_id ORDER BY date_achieved DESC;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeProfile;
SELECT full_name, email, department FROM EmployeeProfile WHERE join_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, full_name, department FROM EmployeeProfile WHERE department = 'Engineering';
SELECT * FROM Skills WHERE proficiency_level = 'Advanced';
SELECT * FROM Achievements WHERE date_achieved BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM EmployeeProfile WHERE department = 'Engineering';
SELECT full_name, email FROM EmployeeProfile ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT employee_id, full_name, department FROM EmployeeProfile WHERE join_date > '2020-01-01' ORDER BY employee_id DESC;

SELECT p.full_name, c.position, s.skill_name FROM EmployeeProfile p JOIN CareerHistory c ON p.employee_id = c.employee_id JOIN Skills s ON p.employee_id = s.employee_id WHERE s.proficiency_level = 'Expert';

SELECT e.full_name, a.achievement_description, a.date_achieved FROM EmployeeProfile e JOIN Achievements a ON e.employee_id = a.employee_id WHERE a.date_achieved > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY a.date_achieved DESC;
